name: New Year Simulator
description:
New Year Simulator

This is an authentic immersive New Year experience.
Watch fireworks, be surrounded by friends over the New Year table, open gifts, sit in a warm new year atmosphere that will make your soul feel happier.

Features:
-First person 3d game
-Watch fireworks
-Walk around
-Drink juice and eat kebab
-Dialogues
-Snowy levels
-New Year Atmosphere
-Good graphics

This is a single player simulation game that lets you feel the New Year atmosphere. A great way to celebrate New Year. Celebrate the New Year anyime, even in summer.
